name: Flows
author: Isabella Tech

sections.description:
Flows lets you show your business processes, software process, or workflow in a creative responsive design template. Flows plugin is the easiest and fastest way to take your website’s outlook to the next level without having to write a single line of code.

The Flows interface allows any business to easily represent its system or work processes. Its builder makes it easy to clearly show a business’s process to its users.

This step-by-step representation helps you quickly learn or grasp any information. So you can also represent your tutorial in different steps by using this plugin.

This plugin is used for creating:

  • How its Works
  • Tutorials with a Step by Step design
  • Representation a Creation Process
  • Software Lifecycle Showcase
  • Web Development Process
  • Representation a Business Process

How to use it

  1. Create a new Flow on the Flows section in your WordPress installation
  2. Create a new Step of your Flow process
  3. In all the steps you can define: Title, Subtitle, Image, and Description
  4. Once you created the Flow, you can easily show it on any page of your WordPress using this shortcode: [it-flows id=”{flow-id}”]
sections.faq:
How do I show the Flows I have created?

You have to add this shortcode in the page where you want to display the Flow, replacing {flow-id} with the ID of the flow you want to display: [it-flows id=”{flow-id}”]
